Calculate change in trend between years

Source: R/trend_change.R
trend_change.Rd

Calculate change in trend between years

Usage

trend_change(projected_trends = preds_sm, ref_year = 2014, targ_year = 2026)

Arguments

projected_trends

tibble with all draws, years, projected trends, output of proj_trend function

ref_year

numeric year in which change is measured from i.e. 2014

targ_year

numeric year in which target will be reached i.e. 2026

Value

tibble with the average percent change in addition to probability of increase or decrease

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  test_st <- trend_change(predicted_trends = preds_sm,
        ref_year = 2014,
        targ_year = 2026)
} # }
